author: Associated Press
title: China honors virus victims with 3 minutes of reflection
description: With air raid sirens wailing and flags at half-mast, China is holding a three-minute nationwide moment of reflection to honor those who have died in the coronavirus outbreak
content:
Wuhan was placed under complete lockdown on Jan. 23 in an effort to stem the spread of the virus and has been lauded as a heroic city by the nations communist leadership for the sacrifices made by its 11 million citizens.
People have gradually been allowed t… [+2044 chars]
